description: Numbers that are the sum of 2 distinct squares: of form x^2 + y^2 with 0 <= x < y.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: upto=200;max=Floor[Sqrt[upto]];s=Total/@((Subsets[Range[0,max], {2}])^2);Union[Select[s,#<=upto&]]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 01 2011 *)selQ[n_] := Select[ PowersRepresentations[n, 2, 2], 0 <= #[[1]] < #[[2]] &] != {}; Select[Range[200], selQ] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 03 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a001983 n = a001983_list !! (n-1)a001983_list = [x | x <- [0..], a025435 x > 0]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 20 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
